M3 Stage 1 Test List
H. Andrew Black

06-Sep-2001
Version: 1.1

1 Introduction

This document lists the items in M3 that need to be tested during Stage 1 development.

2 The List

The following lists the classes and properties that need to be tested during Stage 1. It assumes that if a class has a Name and/or a Description property, that these properties should also be tested.

  • Etic glosses (while no overt underlying feature structures are needed for Stage 1, they could still be present)
  • MoMorphType
  • PartOfSpeech:
    • AffixTemplates
      • Slots
      • PrefixSlots
      • SuffixSlots
    • AffixSlots
      • Affixes
  • MoMorphoSyntaxInfo
    • Components
  • MoStemMsi
    • PartOfSpeech
  • MoDerivationalAffixMsi
    • FromPartOfSpeech
    • ToPartOfSpeech
    • AffixCategory
  • MoInflectionalAffixMsi
    • AffixCategory
    • maybe something tied to our set of etic glosses? I'm not real sure at this stage: there is an InflectionFeatures property that owns an FS and presumably the content of that FS will correspond to something in our etic gloss underlying feature system.
  • PhPhonologicalData
    • PhonemeSets
      • Phonemes
        • Codes
      • BoundaryMarkers
        • Codes
    • NaturalClasses
      • PhNCSegments
        • Segments
    • Environments
      • LeftContext
      • RightContext
    • Contexts
      • PhSimpleContext
        • PhSimpleContextSeg
          • FeatureStructure (which refers to a PhPhoneme)
        • PhSimpleContextBdry
          • FeatureStructure (which refers to a PhBdryMarker)
        • PhSimpleContextNC
          • FeatureStructure (which refers to a PhNaturalClass)
      • PhIterationContext
        • Minimum
        • Maximum
        • Member
      • PhSequenceContext
        • Members
  • MoMorphologicalData
    • CompoundRules
      • LeftPartOfSpeech
      • RightPartOfSpeech
      • Linker
      • MoEndocentricCompound
        • HeadLast
      • MoExocentricCompound
        • ToPartOfSpeech
    • AdhocCoProhibitions
      • Adjacency
      • MoAllomorphAdhocCoProhibition
        • Allomorphs
      • MoMorphemeAdhocCoProhibition
        • Morphemes
    • PhoneEnvs (I think this is no longer needed - it's under PhPhonologicalData above)
    • AnalyzingAgents[1]
    • TestSets[1]
  • MoForm
    • Form
    • SecEnvConstraint
    • MorphType
  • MoAffixAllomorph
    • InflectionClasses
    • MsEnvPartOfSpeech
    • PhoneEnviron
    • Position
  • MoStemAllomorph
    • PhoneEnviron

Endnotes

[1]

I believe that these are to be included in Stage 1, but I'm not totally sure.
